last_episode_to_air.name: Tainted Water
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three strangers attempt to endure 30 days in a remote wilderness location with no tools or modern amenities; faced with extreme challenges, it'll take all their ingenuity and stamina to work together as a team and survive.

name: Alone: The Beast
overview: Three strangers attempt to endure 30 days in a remote wilderness location with no tools or modern amenities; faced with extreme challenges, it'll take all their ingenuity and stamina to work together as a team and survive.

episodes.name: Beast or Famine
episodes.overview: Three strangers take on the ultimate survival test: surviving for one month in the Arctic with no tools, just the body of a fallen animal. Lindsay, Joe, and Zane race to preserve their meat, build shelter, and make fire, but illness and the harsh environment push them to the breaking point. Once a hungry predator shows up, their time in the Arctic becomes increasingly dangerous.

episodes.name: Ticking Time Bomb
episodes.overview: Three strangers try to endure 30 days in the Arctic with no tools, just the clothes on their backs and one fallen animal; Ben, Nate and Robert race to preserve their musk ox before it spoils and it attracts the attention of dangerous predators.

episodes.name: Burnt Out
episodes.overview: Living as their ancestors once did with no tools, Anne, Phil, and Shane struggle to make fire, preserve meat, and protect themselves from hungry predators; when a fire destroys a vital resource, they must adapt or face starvation.

episodes.name: Trail of Blood
episodes.overview: Nathan must defend themselves from the brutal Arctic climate and its predators, while struggling to preserve their meat, make fire, and build shelter from the punishing elements.

episodes.name: Swamp of Suffering
episodes.overview: Notwithstanding the certainty of being captured, the woods and swamps are, ... into the swamps, willing to suffer punishment inflicted for such offences, in order to ... one night alone "in the Red River swamp
